function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in work productivity due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Reduced efficiency and output of work","Mitigation":"Implement remote working solutions and flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Video conferencing, collaboration tools, and project management software","People":"Employees, employers, and business owners","Owner":"Employers and business owners"},{"Description":"Undermined workplace collaboration and community interactions","Impact":"Loss of team cohesion and innovation","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual collaboration tools and encourage online team-building activities","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, online team-building software","People":"Employees and business leaders","Owner":"Business leaders and HR departments"},{"Description":"Challenges in workplace management during and after the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing safety and health measures, and adapting to the new normal","Mitigation":"Implement workplace re-entry plans, modify office layouts, and adhere to COVID-19 measures","Technologies":"Office layout planning tools, contact tracing technology, and health monitoring systems","People":"Employers, employees, and facility managers","Owner":"Employers and facility managers"}]}
